!PARAMETER -receptor
  !ALIAS -rec
  !TYPE string
  !REQUIRED true
  !LEGAL_VALUE *.oeb
  !LEGAL_VALUE *.oeb.gz
  !BRIEF A receptor file the molecules pass to the -in flag will be docked to
!END

!PARAMETER -in
  !TYPE string
  !REQUIRED true
  !BRIEF Multiconformer file of molecules to be docked.
!END

!PARAMETER -out
  !TYPE string
  !REQUIRED true
  !BRIEF Docked molecules will be written to this file
!END
